article.title: DRS Supports Force XXI Battle Command Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: DRS Tactical Systems Incorporated, Melbourne, Florida, was awarded a $248,260,000 firm-fixed-price indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for the procurement of installation kits to support the electrical and mechanical interfaces between the Force XXI Battle Command Brigade and Below systems and the vehicle platform. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
